articles.author: SHOICHIRO TAGUCHI
articles.title: U.S. considering curbing China's cloud access, official says - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Washington fears Beijing could use cloud-based tech to develop military AI
articles.content: TOKYO -- Washington is considering measures to restrict China's access to cloud computing services provided by American companies as it pushes to curb Beijing's efforts to develop artificial intellig… [+398 chars]
